content: You will most likely get poisoned during the battle, so you might want to take some Antimiasma Powder with you to cure you if your health gets dangerously low.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Scorpion_Prince_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Scorpion Prince Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Scorpion Prince Fight'.
The content is as follows:
You will most likely get poisoned during the battle, so you might want to take some Antimiasma Powder with you to cure you if your health gets dangerously low.
